title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 702.1 - Application of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 702.1 - Application of rules

State Regulations

These rules shall apply in all
criminal actions and proceedings in courts subject to the jurisdiction of the

Appellate Division of the Supreme Court in the Second Judicial Department. They
are intended to supplement, but not to supersede, the Rules of Professional

Conduct set forth in Part 1200 of this Title and the Rules of Judicial Conduct
set forth in Part 100 of this Title. In the event of any conflict between the
provisions of these rules and the Rules of Professional Conduct and/or the

Rules of Judicial Conduct, the Rules of Professional Conduct and/or the Rules
of Judicial Conduct shall prevail. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
702.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
